name: Smart Thief 3 Free
description: You are probably the best runner, but you have to prove it us. Join delightful Smart Thief on his big adventure. The thief who is not only smart but also a cute, clever and Utterly charming bike rider who is being chased by the international police. Play the role of an unconventional hero who uses cunning and trickery to out-smart his opponents. But beware! He faces fearsome foes and tons of surprising interactive gameplay elements along the way. Explore fully interactive levelless game and uncover hidden treasures and collect gold coins and other surprises at every turn! Gain as much money as you can, Hurry! Everyone try to catch you, but you are clever, aren’t you? Find combo speed boosts, bikes, and grab power-ups to survive. Choose the best mode, day or night to start this big adventure race.
